author: rcm
msg: Changed drawing so clearing background extends to edge; fixes problem where there was a white line at bottom of tree.

author: rcm
msg: The viewer now starts up at the size specified in the properties file; or near-full screen if no size is explicitly specified.
When using the 'X' on the title bar to exit the application a dialog is used to confirm that you wish to exit.

author: rcm
msg: Moved the setting up of the popup menu to the viewer

author: rcm
msg: Added content to the popup menu so it can provide a name and description for user help.
